topic.title: Create a GSM/3G Trunk
topic.shortdesc: To create a GSM/3G trunk on your PBX, you need to install the relevant module.

ol.li:
Install GSM/3G module.
Power off the PBX.
Open the upper case of the PBX.
Place the GSM/3G module above the main board, slowly insert each pin into right slot.

Log in the PBX web interface, go to PBX Monitor Trunks to check the trunk status.
If the trunk status shows the signal icon , or , the trunk is ready for use. For more information on trunk status, see GSM/3G Trunk Status.

Go to Settings PBX Trunks , configure the basic settings of the 4G trunk.
Name: Give this trunk a name to help you identify it.
PIN Code: Enter the SIM card PIN code if the card has one.
RX Volume: Set the receiving volume of GSM port or choose Custom to define the RX Gain below.
TX Volume: Set the transmitting volume of GSM port or choose Custom to define the TX Gain below.
Configure other GSM/3G/4G trunk settings as your need.
